name: 乔亚·约瑟夫
introduction: Joya Joseph is an American actor, writer, producer and director. Born in upstate NY but mostly raised in NJ, Joya's love for on-camera acting grew from her early experience in theater. Pivoting to a professional path in her late 30s, she has trained in techniques such as the Meisner technique and that of Uta Hagen. In addition to acting in film and television, Joya has focused recently on writing, directing and producing her own work including Blaming and Shaming and Pressure Cooked. Joya is known for her ability to capture the essence of a wide variety of characters from serious to hilarious, but always thought-provoking.
